body.name: Ironing Board with Iron Rest, Iron Board with 3 Layers Extra Thick Cover, Compact and Space Saver Foldable Ironing Board, Adjustable Height, Easy Storage with Smart Hanger and Lightweight Design
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 1 hr 54 mins
features: SPACE SAVER & LIGHTWEIGHT: Happhom Compact Ironing Board is an excellent option for small places with its amazing space-saving size (13”x43”). It folds almost flat to fit anywhere where space is limited. With the help of assembled stylish hanger, you can store in any closet in your house, a laundry room, or a dorm.

PERFECT IRONING EXPERIENCE: Lightweight steel frame with strong, durable and long-lasting connections provide perfect stability. You achieve perfect and wrinkle free clothes in a fraction of time with the help of non-slip feet and locked feet design. The storage lock keeps it closed safely so it will not open accidentally.

EXTRA THICK PADDING FOR REMARKABLE DURABILITY: Heavy-duty padding (9 mm thick felt) and meticulously crafted special knitted fabric provides exceptional durability to ironing board cover. Top layer is extremely soft and heat resistant.Happhom cover is specially designed to meet a contemporary taste. Our cover with exclusive patterns and design is a great fit to family d‚cor.

HEIGHT ADJUSTABLE EFFORTLESSLY: Enjoy a tailored ironing experience with the versatile 7-level height adjustment feature, allowing you to effortlessly customize the board to your preferred working height (29-36 inches) for ergonomic comfort.

ULTRA STURDT IRON REST: A dedicated iron rest provides a safe and secure place to place your hot iron, ensuring hassle-free ironing sessions without the risk of accidental burns or damage to surfaces.

MANUFACTURED WITH STURDY MATERIAL: Happhom Smart Ironing Board is designed and manufactured with sturdy steel and material. Non-slip metal legs, locked feet design and strong long-lasting connections provide exceptional rigidity when the board is in use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The ironing board is well made, stable, removable, washable, stackable and easy to store.
reviews.reviewText: The quality of the ironing board is very good, the height is easy to adjust, the heat dissipation is very good, the flatness is also good, the color is very attractive, the main stand is stable, it is very stable when placed on the ground and will not shake, it is very strong, and the appearance is good. It's quite big, the length and width are suitable. The size of the ironing pants is big enough. It's very good. It's much more convenient to iron clothes. I used to use a vertical garment iron to iron shirts and they were always uneven. Now I use a steam iron on the ironing board. Ironing shirts is a cure for obsessive-compulsive disorder.The only drawback is that the wall thickness of the pipe is a bit thin, but it should be no problem for home use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and Space-Saving!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this ironing board because the one I had was about 50 or 60 years old. I inherited from my mom and it was so big and heavy I had trouble fitting it anywhere. My new ironing board is more compact and it’s lightweight so I can move it easily. I love that it has thick padding and the top layer is heat resistant. It also has an iron rest that protects the iron from scratches. The iron rest also doubles as a hanger for the board. This ironing board is very sturdy and well-made and is adjustable to 7 different heights. But it’s compact size is what I really needed most.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Set Up and Collapse
reviews.reviewText: The latch/unlatch mechanism works really well and allows you to expand the board to differentheights.The iron rest could have a better method of keeping the iron from falling/sliding off the rest, but I'm glad it's there. My only ironing board did not have an iron rest.The cover is well-cushioned and it's not too heavy.Does the job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Very flimsy board
reviews.reviewText: Very flimsy board not as good as my old homaz usa made board it feels really junk wobbles board the hanger has no use since board is to tall to hang in a closet

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a standard full-size ironing board. It sets up and folds down easily, and the padding is thick enough to keep your fabrics safe. The iron holder is secure and convenient and the caps on the feet protect your floors from scratches. Overall it gets the job done well, but the price tag ($80 at the time of this review) is a little high for non-premium materials.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This ironing board works S intended. It is sturdy and the iron holder is very useful! I like the fabric and the color of it as it is neutral and blends with practically anything. I like how easy it folds for easy storage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It is easy to set up and take down. It’s on my standard ironing board wall hooks. It’s much easier to handle than a big board. It is suitable for perfect ironing. Shipping was quick too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Quick shipment. Well made from quality material. Strong and sturdy and stable. Love the color. Easy to set up. Easy to use. Good price. Good deal. Exactly what I was looking for.
